channel.title: Help about using someone as a host please, thanx!
channel.description:
Ok then i want to have my server hosted, however i need to know if this is correct:
Would i delete all java files and the compiler, and 'hide' (using right click and clicking on properties) all other files appart from the runserver.bat and mabey a littler note to the guy whos hosting the server?
Please tell me if that is what i need to do, if not what do i need to do?
Also im on no-ip, so do i keep my server IP and just put my hosts IP in the IP Address box, or does the guy need to have the no-ip IP on his no-ip account?
Thanx

item.title: Help about using someone as a host please, thanx!
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

I think.
If it’s possible.
You could trust the person, that would make it alot easier.

Read full topic
item.source: Help about using someone as a host please, thanx!
